argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_absval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` A ) = ( sqrt ` ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( abs ` A ) = ( sqrt ` ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_sqvald | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A ^ 2 ) = ( A x. A ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cjre | |- ( A e. RR -> ( * ` A ) = A ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) = ( A x. A ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A ^ 2 ) = ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. RR -> ( sqrt ` ( A ^ 2 ) ) = ( sqrt ` ( A x. ( * ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( A e. RR -> ( abs ` A ) = ( sqrt ` ( A ^ 2 ) ) ) |
